Articles.Description: Award-winning actress Helena Bonham Carter, 56, has forged a long career in Hollywood by selecting roles uniquely suited to her particular talents. Now, in a recent interview, she has once again evinced that same independent thinking by coming to the defense …

Articles.Author: Joey Paur
Articles.Title: Nicolas Cage Wants John Carpenter to Make More Movies; Carpenter Would Rather Launch Nicholas Cage University
Articles.Description: Like the rest of us movie geeks, Nicolas Cage would like to see John Carpenter direct another movie one day. It’s been 12 years since Carpenter helmed a feature film with the 2010 psychological horror thriller The Ward. Since then he’s mostly been playing vid…
